title: Rent?
subtitle: How much is the monthly rent for the available space in your place

title: Bathrooms?
subtitle: Give the number of bathrooms in your place

title: Elevator?
subtitle: Does your building have an elevator and if yes, how many

title: Accessibility?
subtitle: Is your place wheelchair accessible?
hint: Middle position is if it can be adapted

title: Pet friendly?
subtitle: Do you tolerate pets
hint: Middle position is if you are fine either way

title: Smoking?
subtitle: Where do you stand on cigarette smoke
hint: Middle position is if you are fine either way

title: Marijuana?
subtitle: Where do you stand on marijuana smoke
hint: Middle position is if you are fine either way

title: How long do you see yourself living in this place?
subtitle: Give the number of years you plan on staying in the place you are currently renting

title: Frequent social gatherings?
subtitle: On a scale of 1 to 10 where do you stand on social gatherings in your shared place?
hint: 1 rarely is OK - 10  frequently is fine

title: Music and Singing
subtitle: What is your stance on practising musical instruments or singing in your place?
hint: Middle position is if you are fine either way

title: Bedrooms?
subtitle: Give the number of available bedrooms in your place

title: Family oriented?
subtitle: On a scale of 1 to 10 how confortable are you with living with a family?
